text: Hagi nagri eri'za vahe'mo'za Lebanonitira ana zafaramina antagi'za eri'za hagerintera erami'nage'na magokepi eritru hu'na anaki'nugeno hagerimpi eri'za e'za kema hunante e'za nofira eme ahekampru hanagenka ana zafaramina erigahane. Hagi ana zafamofo mizama'a nagrira ne'zanku navesiankinka, nonifima nemaniza naganimofo ne'zana namigahane.
